Class ClickDisplay

java.lang.Object
Layout.PamFramePlots
clickDetector.ClickDisplay
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClickBTDisplay, ClickSpectrum, ClickTrigger, ClickWaveform, ConcatenatedSpectrogram, IDI_Display, WignerPlot
public abstract class ClickDisplay extends PamFramePlots
Common functionality for all display windows in the click detector panel

Doug Gillespie
